Text:
Just so you know, this is not a region-free copy.  If your xbox 360 is a USA version, this will not be playable.  I'm using LT+ 1.61, if I recall correctly.

USA?  Get it here:  http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6614350/El_Shaddai_Ascension_Of_The_Metatron[Eng]usa[XBOX360][ArShAd]

I haven't tried that one yet but I'll mention it here and there if I have any problems.
I confirm this is PAL only version. Checked with abgx and it is 100% green (only .dvd file will be fixed).
